nodes.title: Tesla said it delivered 310,000 vehicles from January through March, up from 185,000 cars during the same period in 2021. The nearly 70 percent increase was in contrast with major carmakers like General Motors and Toyota, which reported big sales declines. https://t.co/mCNjxKcXhV

特斯拉表示，从1月到3月，它交付了31万辆汽车，比2021年同期的18.5万辆有所增长。近70%的增长与通用汽车和丰田等主要汽车制造商形成鲜明对比，后者报告的销量大幅下降。https://t.co/mCNjxKcXhV。
